testcase.name: Buy a SwagLabs product successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User launched SwagLabs application....................................passed When User logged in the app using username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed And User adds "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket" product to the cart................passed And User enters Checkout details with "Ashish", "Ghosh", "1181".............passed And User completes Checkout process.........................................passed Then User should get the Confirmation of Order..............................passed

testcase.name: Login to SwagLabs Application with Correct credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launched SwagLabs application....................................passed When User logged in the app using username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then user should be able to log in..........................................passed

testcase.name: Login to SwagLabs Application with Wrong credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launched SwagLabs application....................................passed When User logged in the app using username "locked_out_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then User should not get logged in..........................................passed
